project.description: if new code then build and deploy ovoc-7.4.0.zip if new code then build and deploy ovoc-7.4.2000.zip if new code then build and deploy ovoc-7.4.3000.zip if new code then build and deploy ovoc-7.6.zip

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!c:\cygwin64\bin\bash --login -i ##!C:\Program Files\Git\bin\bash --login -i set -e cd $WORKSPACE
#until branch 7.8.1000 (include) use nvm 12.16.1 (npm 12.16.1 and yarn 1.5.1) from 7.8.2000 use nvm 12.16.2(npm 12.16.2 and yarn 1.22.4) if [[ "$GERRIT_BRANCH" == "7.4"* || "$GERRIT_BRANCH" == "7.6"* || "$GERRIT_BRANCH" == "7.8" || "$GERRIT_BRANCH" == "7.8.1000" ]] then nvm use 12.16.1 else nvm use 12.16.2 fi
if [[ "$GERRIT_BRANCH" != "7.4"* ]] && [[ "$GERRIT_BRANCH" != "7.6" ]] then # adding ac-infra echo "git submodule init" git submodule init echo "git submodule update" git submodule update echo "finish submodule" #rm -rf yarn.lock fi
#connect repositories using https instead opf git: git config url.https://.insteadOf git://
# we build only if jenkins checked out on the last commit in branch, else exit 0 LastGerritCommitHash=$( git ls-remote | grep refs/heads/$GERRIT_BRANCH | cut -f 1 | head -n 1 ) echo $LastGerritCommitHash echo $GERRIT_PATCHSET_REVISION if [ "$LastGerritCommitHash" == "$GERRIT_PATCHSET_REVISION" ] then if [[ "$GERRIT_BRANCH" == "7.4"* ]] || [[ "$GERRIT_BRANCH" == "7.6"* ]] then output=$( netstat -ano | grep -wF 5678 ) || true echo "private-bower check =" $output if [[ -z "$output" ]] then private-bower & sleep 15 fi fi
# for version 7.4.2000 and down, use nmp/bower if [[ "$GERRIT_BRANCH" == "7.4" || "$GERRIT_BRANCH" == "7.4.1000" || "$GERRIT_BRANCH" == "7.4.2000" ]] then echo "RUN:npm install" npm install echo "RUN: bower install --force-latest" bower install --force-latest # for version 7.4.3000 and up, use yarn else
yarn config set registry https://artifactory/api/npm/npm/ yarn config set strict-ssl false if [[ "$GERRIT_BRANCH" == "7.4"* || "$GERRIT_BRANCH" == "7.6"* || "$GERRIT_BRANCH" == "7.8" || "$GERRIT_BRANCH" == "7.8.1000" ]] then echo "RUN: yarn install" yarn install else echo "RUN: yarn i" yarn i fi fi
#update version number before grunt dist #change the hard-coded "7.4.0" to branch name + jenkins build number # for example: 7.4.3000.235 current_branch=`git branch --no-color -r --contains HEAD | grep -v -e '->' | head -1 | awk -F'/' '{print $NF}'` perl -pi -e "s/7.4.0/${current_branch}.${BUILD_NUMBER}/g" build.config.js
if [[ "$GERRIT_BRANCH" == "7.4" || "$GERRIT_BRANCH" == "7.4.1000" || "$GERRIT_BRANCH" == "7.4.2000" ]] then echo "RUN: grunt dist" grunt dist else # set the build number as a version, and run dist if [ -f webpack.config.js ]; then echo "*** adding Jenkins BUILD_NUMBER as a version in file webpack.config.js ***" perl -pi -e "s/\"%version%\"/\"${BUILD_NUMBER}\"/g" webpack.config.js fi echo "RUN: yarn run distTest" yarn run distTest
#kill the Proxy Server process pidNumber=$(netstat -ano | grep 9000 | awk '{print $5}' | head -n 1 | sed -e "s/[[:space:]]\+/ /g") echo "pidNumber = $pidNumber" if [[ ! -z "$pidNumber" ]] then echo "killing the proccess of the protractor proxy server" taskkill /F /PID "$pidNumber" fi if [[ "$GERRIT_BRANCH" == "7.4.3000" ]] then echo "for 7.4.3000 NO Protractor or UITests running" #for branch 7.6 run protractor TESTS elif [[ "$GERRIT_BRANCH" == "7.6" ]] then echo "RUN: yarn run protractorProxyServer" yarn run protractorProxyServer & sleep 15 echo "RUN: yarn run protractorServer" yarn run protractorServer & sleep 15 echo "RUN: yarn run protractor" yarn run protractor #all others branches (7.6.1000 and up) run uiTests else if [[ "$GERRIT_BRANCH" == "7.6.1000" ]] then #change serverName to proxy server ip #sed -i -- 's/%serverName%/172.17.118.91/g' ${WORKSPACE}/proxyServer.js echo "no commits in 7.6.1000" elif [[ "$GERRIT_BRANCH" == "7.6.2000" ]] then sed -i -- 's/%serverName%/172.17.118.92/g' ${WORKSPACE}/proxyServer.js else #temporary if [[ "$GERRIT_BRANCH" == "7.8" || "$GERRIT_BRANCH" == "7.8.1000" ]] then echo "172.17.118.95" sed -i -- 's/%serverName%/172.17.118.95/g' ${WORKSPACE}/proxyServer.js else echo "172.17.118.93" sed -i -- 's/%serverName%/172.17.118.93/g' ${WORKSPACE}/proxyServer.js fi fi #change username and password sed -i -- 's/%username%/acladmin/g' ${WORKSPACE}/cypress/support/config.ts sed -i -- 's/%password%/pass_1234/g' ${WORKSPACE}/cypress/support/config.ts sed -i -- "s/%version%/${BUILD_NUMBER}/g" ${WORKSPACE}/cypress/support/config.ts if [[ "$GERRIT_BRANCH" == "7.6"* || "$GERRIT_BRANCH" == "7.8" || "$GERRIT_BRANCH" == "7.8.1000" ]] then echo "RUN: yarn run proxyServer" yarn run proxyServer & sleep 15 else echo "RUN: yarn run p && sleep 15" yarn run p && sleep 15 fi echo "RUN: yarn test:jenkins" yarn test:jenkins fi echo "RUN: yarn run distFull" yarn run distFull #create zip files echo "generating zip file" if [[ "$GERRIT_BRANCH" != "7.4"* && "$GERRIT_BRANCH" != "7.6"* && "$GERRIT_BRANCH" != "7.8" ]] then PATH=${PATH}:"/cygdrive/c/Program Files/7-Zip" if [[ "$GERRIT_BRANCH" == "7.8.1000" ]] then 7z.exe a -r dist/ovoc-ui.zip build/. else perl -pi -e "s/%version%/${BUILD_NUMBER}/g" dist/ovoc/index.html 7z.exe a -r dist/ovoc-ui.zip dist/ovoc/. fi else echo "RUN:yarn run zip" yarn run zip fi fi
#rename zip file to ovoc-7.4.0.zip in order to deploy in one name to artifactory if [[ "$GERRIT_BRANCH" == "7.4" || "$GERRIT_BRANCH" == "7.4.1000" || "$GERRIT_BRANCH" == "7.4.2000" || "$GERRIT_BRANCH" == "7.4.3000" ]] then mv dist/ovoc*.zip dist/ovoc-7.4.0.zip # from 7.6 we use a new name: else mv dist/ovoc*.zip dist/ovoc-ui.zip fi else echo "****** This is not the last commit. Exit without building ******" fi

#!C:\Program Files\Git\bin\bash --login -i set -x message="Build after submit failed: ${BUILD_URL}artifact/cypress/videos/ovoc/" CURL="curl -kn -u jenkins:$jpass --silent" base=https://$GERRIT_HOST/a/changes id=${GERRIT_PROJECT}~${GERRIT_BRANCH}~${GERRIT_CHANGE_ID} idEscaped=${id////%2F} endpoint="/$idEscaped/revisions/$GERRIT_PATCHSET_REVISION/review" pathToVideos="cypress/videos/ovoc" checkIfMP4Exists=$(find "$pathToVideos" -name *.mp4)
if [[ "$checkIfMP4Exists" != "" ]] then $CURL -X POST "$base/$endpoint" --header "Content-Type: application/json;charset=UTF-8" -d "{\"message\": \"$message\"}" fi

#!C:\Program Files\Git\bin\bash --login -i set -x message="Build was successful in retry ${NAGINATOR_COUNT}" CURL="curl -kn -u jenkins:$jpass --silent" base=https://$GERRIT_HOST/a/changes id=${GERRIT_PROJECT}~${GERRIT_BRANCH}~${GERRIT_CHANGE_ID} idEscaped=${id////%2F} endpoint="/$idEscaped/revisions/$GERRIT_PATCHSET_REVISION/review" pathToVideos="cypress/videos/ovoc" checkIfMP4Exists=$(find "$pathToVideos" -name *.mp4) if [[ $NAGINATOR_COUNT -ge 0 ]] then $CURL -X POST "$base/$endpoint" --header "Content-Type: application/json;charset=UTF-8" -d "{\"message\": \"$message\"}" fi

hudson.plugins.emailext.ExtendedEmailPub.defaultSubject: ALERT !!! OVOC WEB-UI BUILD FAILED AFTER SUBMIT !!! ALERT
hudson.plugins.emailext.ExtendedEmailPub.defaultContent: Review console output of this build: $BUILD_URL
